name: ButtonStyle
description: A structure used to describe the style state of a button

content.name: body_colour
content.description:
the background colour
default: {r:0.9, g:0.9, b:0.9, a:1.0}

content.name: line_colour
content.description:
the colour of the outline
default: {r:0.1, g:0.1, b:0.1, a:1.0}

content.name: thickness
content.description:
the thickness of the outline
default: 1.0

content.name: text_font
content.description:
the font used for text
default: "arial"

content.name: text_spacing
content.description:
the size of spacing within text
default: 2.5

content.name: text_inter_character_spacing
content.description:
the distance between individual characters
default: 0.5

content.name: text_detail
content.description:
the level of detail to be used when rendering the font
default: 2

content.name: text_colour
content.description:
the colour of the text
default: {r:0.0, g:0.0, b:0.0, a:1.0}
